This unique opportunity is priced at $950000, reflecting its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers. We believe this investment could significantly impact your business positively. # Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
